overview: Bill joined VantagePoint in 2002 after having served as CEO for a VantagePoint portfolio company. Previously, he was founding CEO of Team Fuel, an energy software and outsourcing company. In 1995, Bill developed the Strategic Chemical Management Group, one of the nationâ€™s first outsourced chemical managers. Prior to that, he founded Ecolink, one of the first businesses to develop alternatives to ozone layer-depleting solvents and chemicals, as well as ENFORM, the Environmental Forum on Technology and Business. He also co-authored the graduate text Hazardous Solvent SourceReduction, published by McGraw-Hill in 1995.
